pageContext.claim: “A movement like this has never happened before. It's never happened, and we have to keep it going and finish it out.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has been questioned about this claim. The abolitionist movement, the civil rights movement, the women's suffrage movement, the anti-fascist movement during World War II, the anti-Apartheid movement and the global human rights movement all come to mind, just to name a few. Trump's case would be stronger had he won the popular vote in 2016 -- or was re-elected in 2020.
